Description.Text: Maritim Hotel Magdeburg is a friendly 4-star property offering modern accommodation in the heart of Magdeburg. Highlights include an indoor swimming pool, a gym and excellent transport links. Magdeburg is the capital city of the Bundesland of Saxony-Anhalt, situated on the banks of the river Elbe. The historic centre boasts an eclectic mix of old and new with medieval landmarks brushing against unique, contemporary buildings. Nearby places of interest include the Monastery of Our Lady, Magdeburg Cathedral, Waterway Junction and the Green Citadel of Magdeburg. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Magdeburg destinations. The hotel is housed in a contemporary mid-rise building with reflective glass panelling. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, a sauna and gym. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Classic rooms are 28sqm and situated on the lower floors of the hotel with views of the street or the hotel building. They are decorated in a modern style with light wood furniture, carpeted floors and artwork on the walls. They feature a sitting area with two armchairs and a table. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels and a mini-bar. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. Da Capo offers regional and international cuisine in a modern setting with a terrace. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the Piano bar and the Gallery bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
